Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: Improved SOL distribution model is live[/url] Automatic SOL distribution is back along with new ways to use it within Sola.  The revamped SOL distribution model is back and live. From the user perspective it feels pretty much the same; you post cards and comments, and receive SOL when other people vote for your content. The major changes are under the hood. What is the difference? Before: fraudulent users were able to affect value distribution significantly, disproportionate to their contribution to the overall value creation. In other words, they were distributing more value than they created themselves. This led to attempts to trick and defraud the system. Now: economy value, created by user for service, defines the amount of SOL they distribute with their votes. With their votes, users define the proportion of SOL distribution, but not its amount. Basically, one vote of one user can easily have more value than one hundred votes of other users. The changes will make it harder for fraudulent players to trick the system without increasing overall value along the way, which ironically is economically beneficial to the system and, as a result, every user. Altogether with the previous SOL distribution system we removed the complicated logic of action points. The new improvements allow us to remove the much disputed semi-manual fraud detection check for withdrawal operations to external wallets. Now, the card reward will be accrued and sent to the internal Sola wallet at the time of card expiration, which is 7 days since its creation.    Boost and revive Along with the improved SOL distribution model we added two ways to use SOL in the app. First, you can get some additional exposure to your cards with clear and simple pricing. Each 100 views will cost you 2 SOL. There is a limit of how many views you can get in this way and at the launch it will be limited to no more than 500. Of course, your cards will still spread naturally, this option is if you want to boost them. Second, you can revive an expired card and make it spread and receive votes for additional 7 days. The date of creation will stay the same so viewers will know when it was actually created. Both boosted and revived cards are prominently marked with the corresponding badges.    New ways to earn and spend SOL will follow soon with two types of challenges: Sola and user-generated ones, improved airdrop program, and more.  Thanks for reading and using Sola.  https://medium.com/solaplatform/improved-sol-distribution-model-is-live-d3daea626514

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: ❗️MEW SOL displaying issue update.  You might have an issue with displaying the correct amount of your SOL on MEW.  MyEtherWallet made a fix for this issue in offline version 3.1.2 but haven't updated the website yet — it is still running the 3.11.1.7 version.  You can run MyEtherWallet offline, locally, to see your actual SOL amount. It's actually more safe way and we're strongly recommended to do so.  Please find the guide to set it up, here: https://myetherwallet.github.io/knowledge-base/offline/running-myetherwallet-locally.html

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: We are happy to announce SOL is listed on Tidex exchange. You can trade SOL in two currency pairs: SOL/BTC and SOL/ETH.  Tidex is a fast-growing, secure, and user-friendly exchange. It has a flat fee of only 0.1% that can be reduced down to 0.05% through participation in the loyalty program.   We also collected most frequently asked questions from our Telegram chat.  And since the chat is growing, and a lot of talks happens there, we made the channel for news and announcements without noise. Make sure to join.  HOW TO WITHDRAW SOL FROM THE APP In-app wallet will be ready later in January. It will allow you to transfer SOL from the app to your ETH wallet.  WHAT ARE EXCHANGES Tidex OpenLedger EtherDelta More to come.  WHEN NEW EXCHANGES We are working to bring SOL on new exchanges. We are talking to Kucoin, Cobinhood, Binance, and dozens of other. It's a process and it takes time. We will inform you at once there will be news.  WHEN COINMARKETCAP When daily trade volume exceeds USD 50K  CAN'T FIND SOL ON ETHERDELTA Right before SOL listing, EtherDelta made an unexpected statement they stop to list new tokens until the end of their ICO and require a deposit from now.  At the moment you can trade on EtherDelta with this link.  DO YOU HAVE AIRDROP OR REFERRAL PROGRAM? We never had airdrop. We have a referral program that earns you 10% of SOL made by a referred user within 365 days after the registration. To participate, you need to register on http://sola.ai or in Sola app. You can find a referral link to your profile on the dashboard. Additionally, any card link is a referral by default, so simply share great cards with your friends.  I WANT TO HELP. HOW? If you have a contact in crypto exchange, media or any other you think can be useful for Sola, we would be happy with an introduction. Please write to 13th@sola.foundation  Otherwise, the best way to help is to spread awareness about Sola by sharing links to it, writing reviews in your social media accounts and stores, telling friends. Please write to ea@sola.foundation if you need graphics material or anything.

Author: gmrfrost
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: Here is the thing. You make a transfer as ordered from Sola ICO webpage. The generate a unique ETH address just for receive from you. Let's say: 0xcc8c050e247d2de9fbf53611b141020ee0ecdf10  https://etherscan.io/tx/0x3af0715b9fd3c74ad680fe86ff424723fd41bca9143116aa649efa48f6f631cd  As soon has ETH is received, its is moved:  https://etherscan.io/address/0xcc8c050e247d2de9fbf53611b141020ee0ecdf10  So, from there is moved to another one : https://etherscan.io/address/0x95fe74e792a3b8bac30e33261d28e64921b50c37  And, man, from this account there are incomes from a miriad of different accounts, and eth is moved to a few ones: https://etherscan.io/address/0xd600fabf28fd3b05540dac31a7adf0737323dc96  Internal transactions points to:  https://etherscan.io/address/0x209c4784ab1e8183cf58ca33cb740efbf3fc18ef  Which is Poloniex_2   Added: As informed in the telegram chat, it seems openledger.io is used as escrow (https://openledger.info/itos-icos-and-tokens/) I gues they work with Polinex...  I am not accostumed to this, the former ICOs I have invested there were always in one isolated account. So let's give time and a vote of faith to Sola Foundation and let's see how this tunr out.  Good luck Sola. I hope your Social Network is better than f**** Facebook

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: We want to share with you the most interesting moments of Sola public activity from the last weeks.  Last week Sola CEO Ilya Zudin spoke to the Atlas Blockchain YouTube channel. You absolutely have to watch it if you want to get the detailed information about Sola.  If you are more of a reader than a watcher, read through the super-detailed Q&A with Sola at ICO Alert.   If you want something short, you may want to check out the interview to TokenZone at the Blockchain & Bitcoin Conference Russia, here you will find the video and the printed version.  To get an outsider’s view of the project, you might want to read a very nice Startup Radius story, watch the review from one of the most popular YouTube crypto-channels in Russia, or read about the project at Crypto Coins News or The Merkle.  To dig deeper and learn the project from every side, stay tuned for our interview to Forbes. We are expecting it to be released this week. We had a great insightful discussion, so don't miss it.

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: The product is up and running with hundreds of thousands of users. You can find the links on our website. Before we were researching new ways to spread information based on viral infections models and initially it was called Plague. Later we were forced to change its name to Plag. Now we are adding business model and decentralization, and new name Sola (short for "Social Layer") fits better.  Golos and Steem are products made for geeks and far from mass consumers. Sola has more users than Steem and Golos combined. Sola is a mobile-first product as it should be in 2017.  Sola economics based on real revenue streams combined with Users Incentive Fund, we are not printing tokens daily.  You can check our WP for more - the whole section devoted to the market overview.

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: Tomorrow on November 27 at 2:00 PM UTC we are opening our Token sale.  The Sola is a rare and unique investment opportunity — the project got a lot of excitement, and we're expecting the fast and smooth sale. Here's why: - It's a working project with 650,000+ users; - the sale will activate the business model, to accelerate the growth of the user base; - the project has the adequate valuation. We raised several investment rounds from the VC, and we are perfectly aware of the risks of overvaluation; - our hard cap is only $5M. We are ready to grow along with the service, to raise more when we prove our progress and growth.  Until this moment, we got 10000+ registered participants and counting, so we suggest you act fast. You will see the progress of the sale on our website — http://sola.foundation Please, carefully look through the terms of the sale one more time: Total supply: 150,000,000 SOL. Tokens for sale: 50,000,000 SOL. Hard cap: 5,000,000 USD. Soft cap: 750,000 USD. Token price: 0.1 USD. Token type: ERC20. Accepted currencies: BTC, ETH, BTS, LTC, DASH, bitUSD, bitEUR, bitCNY. If you want to invest more than $50k, we can also offer you a fiat option. Supply is fixed, no more tokens will be issued. Unsold tokens (if any) will be burned. Tokens will be distributed after the end of the sale.  There will be three tiers based on fundraising progress: - up to $750K the discount is 15%; - from $750K to $1.5M the discount is 10%; - from $1.5M to $3M the discount is 5%.  To act fast when the sale starts, we recommend you to check the instruction for buying tokens right now, here: https://sola.foundation/how-to-en.html If you're speaking one of the following languages, click the link to get the instruction for you: — Japanese (https://sola.foundation/how-to-jp.html); — Korean (https://sola.foundation/how-to-ko.html); — Russian (https://sola.foundation/how-to-ru.html).  All the asap questions you can address to the team, directly, in our Telegram chat. We're there all the time — https://t.me/solaplatform

Author: Sola.foundation
Title: [ANN][SOL] The next-gen decentralized social network
Body: Each Sola user can vote for posts or comments with Action Points (AP). With each vote, the author of the content immediately receives SOL coins, the rate is calculated instantly depending on how much money in the "SOL Repository". "SOL Repository" are filled from advertisers, partners and 12% of all the tokens supply evenly during the first year.  For example, if a user votes with 10 AP, you will receive 5 SOL now.
